Text: Hello and thanks for this Ultimate version of dolphin but i have a little question can i import savegame from my older dolphin into this and how?

Shore . just go to the next folder inside the before emulator version used: 

User\Wii\title\00010000 

Move or copy all the folders inside the 00010000 folder to inside the same location in the new emulator version .
Thanks a lot keep up the good work :)
